complete_tasks_to_upgrade: Complete all tasks to upgrade your membership
browse_details: 限時活動 / 任務 / 分享
check_in_task_detail: Check in RewardMe every day to get more bonus points.
converter_detail: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Urna, ut odio nulla posuere turpis mauris purus.
missing_receipt_detail: Please provide the detail of the missing email receipt as much as possible.
redeem_details: 充值卡 / 特別會員福利
onboarding01_title:
Earn rewards by
 doing what you love to do.
onboarding01_detail: No referral link, no expiration, no hassle.
onboarding02_title:
The more you shop,
the more you earn
onboarding02_detail: Get rewarded for your online purchases automatically.
onboarding03_title: A new way to get cash back
onboarding03_detail: Gift cards, cash, or crypto, it’s your call.
linked_emails_detail: It may take some time to analyze your shopping e-receipts. We will notify you once it’s done.
welcome_detail: RewardMe is a cashback app that let you earn points after online/offline shopping, in-app purchase or subscribe to online services.
confirm_select_offer_details: Once you shop in these {number_of_merchants} brands, you will earn cash back.
edit_prefernece_afterward: 建立帳號後你可以在設定裡編輯你的購物喜好
bind_more_email_later: 建立帳號後你可以在設定裡編輯你的綁定郵箱
dont_worry: 我們會透過人工智能技術檢測消費單據，確保消費單據不會在垃圾郵件內。我們無法偷看你的私人郵件。
we_hope_to_provide: 我們希望日後可以提供更適合你的購物返現體驗。
we_will_send_otp: We’ll send you a verification code to your phone via text message.
we_have_sent_otp: We have sent a verification code to {phone_number}.
login_in_agree_terms_and_policy: 登錄你的帳號表示你已接受賞我的 服務條款 與 隱私政策
setting_up_agree_terms_and_policy: 建立你的帳號表示你已接受賞我的 服務條款 與 隱私政策
searching_for_receipts: 正在偵測過去的消費帳單…
it_might_take_some_time: 通常這部分需要一段時間，完成後會通知你。
turn_on_notifications_to_learn: 在你收到獎勵當下立刻收到通知，還有限時活動、最適合你的優惠資訊。
account_setup_done: Your account has been set up
choose_which_currency_for_cashback: Choose which currency for cash back.
forget_pin_detail: We have to verify your identity before resetting your PIN. We’ll send you a verification code to your phone number via text message.
change_phone_number_detail: Before changing the phone number, we have to verify your identity.
edit_preference_in_30_days: 你可以30天內編輯你喜愛的商店一次。返現金額會根據你喜愛的商店和會員等級而改變。
choose_more_brand_when_upgrade: 當你會員等級提升時，你可以選擇更多商店。
get_reward_from_brands: Get rewards when you receives email receipts from these brand.
edited_preference_recently: It seems you’ve edited the preference recently.
edited_in_30_days: You have edited the preference in recent 30 days. You can edit the preference after {date}.
itMayTakeSomeTimeToAnalyze: It may take some time to analyze your shopping e-receipts. We will notify you once it’s done.
youCannonEarnCashbackFrom: You cannot earn cash back from certain cards until you resolve the issues.
you_will_not_get_any_data_rewards_from: You will not get any data rewards from {name}.
we_partner_with_mailtime: We partner with MailTime to securely link your inbox
we_partner_with_plaid: We partner with Plaid to securely link your card
we_partner_with_planto: We partner with Planto to securely link your card
your_transactional_ereceipts_are: Your transactional e-receipts are securely synced though MailTime
transfer_of_your_information: Transfer of your information is encrypted end-to-end
your_credentials_will_never_be: Your credentials will never be made accessible to RewardMe
this_email_is_already_bound: 該郵箱已綁定帳號，如有疑問，請聯絡support@reward.me。
we_partner_with_credigo: We partner with CrediGO to securely link your card
referralOgDescription: Earn cashback as you spend with RewardMe!
joinRewardMeWithThisLink: Join RewardMe with this link and earn reward immediately!
you_will_enjoy_pa_percentage: You will enjoy {pa_percentage} in MDT Stake Rewards. It will be credited in ME to your wallet every 7 days.
confirm_upgrade_to_next_level: Are you sure to upgrade your membership to {next_level} level?
staking_interest_rate_percentage_return_: {percentage}% p.a. MDT Stake Rewards Return in New Token*
mdt_available_in_crypto_exchanges: MDT is available in these crypto exchanges
you_can_stake_after_transfer_mdt_to_depo: You can stake MDT after transfering {amount} MDT to the deposit address below.
select_way_to_retrieve_your_shopping_rec: Select which way to retrieve your shopping records
reward_me_needs_your_transaction_records: RewardMe needs your shopping transaction records in order to give your cash back.
invite_friends_to_reward_me: Invite friends to RewardMe. Rewards will be given if they can finish the account setup.
once_your_friend_entered_the_code: Once your friend entered the code and completed the account setup, you and your friend will get {amount}.
cashbackWillBePaidIn: Cashback will be paid in ME coins
refer_number_of_friends: 邀請 {number, plural, =0 {朋友} one {# 朋友} other {# 朋友}}
bind_number_of_accounts: 綁定 {number, plural, =0 {帳號} one {# 帳號} other {# 帳號}}
choose_issue_region: Choose the issue region of your credit/debit card.
enjoy_cashback_detail: As a RewardMe member, you will enjoy cash back automatically on your purchases. Once a new transaction is recorded, your rewards await!
you_earned_first_reward: You Just Earned Your First Reward!
select_number_of_merchants: {number_of_merchants, plural, =0 {選取} one {選取 # 個商戶} other {選取 # 個商戶}}
this_card_is_already_bound: This card is already bound to an account. Please contact support@reward.me if you think there is any problem.
